summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3628 for the improvement of 62nd Avenue Southwest, from West Spokane Street to Alki Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading, graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 44839, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
